description: This is a Dart source file implementing the main 'home' screen of a Flutter notes app, displaying a list of notes with options to add or delete notes.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main screen showing a list of notes with a Floating Action Button to add new notes.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing notes list, loading state, and user interactions.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes the notes data when dependencies change for the first time.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the home screen, displaying notes or empty state.

methods.name: _buildEmptyState
methods.description: Builds UI when there are no notes.

methods.name: _buildList
methods.description: Builds the list of note items with swipe to delete and navigation to detail.

methods.name: _deleteBg
